text: How to Train Your Dragon is an upcoming American fantasy movie. It is expected to first be shown at CinemaCon on April 2, 2025 and then released on June 13, 2025. It was directed by Dean DeBlois. He also wrote and co-produced the movie with Marc Platt and Adam Siegel. It is a live-action remake of the 2010 movie of the same name. The movie follows a boy named Hiccup as he makes friends with a dragon named Toothless and trains him, going against viking traditions. Most of the movie follows the plot of the 2010 movie. Principal photography for the movie started in Belfast, Northern Ireland on January 15, 2024 and ended on May 16. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s 3D movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:2020s fantasy movies Category:American 3D movies Category:DreamWorks Animation movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:IMAX movies Category:Movies about dragons Category:Movie remakes Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Upcoming movies
title: How to Train Your Dragon (2025 movie)
